title: 1,000 Vegan Recipes
description: From snacks to main dishes to desserts, a vast collection of vegan recipes features a "FAST" icon that highlights recipes that take 30 minutes or less and includes essential cooking guidance for novice or seasoned cooks. 1,000 Vegan Recipes Robertson, Robin John Wiley & Sons IncPublication 2009/10/05Number of 612Binding HARDCOVERLibrary of 2008055898
author: Robin    Robertson
